gloss: 處格-前面<主事焦點>=我.主格
free: #n ngawayan (我的)前面; i 要; mu 往; patraran 外面
#n跟同輩說的，uwa 去，我先離開那個人。
#n跟長輩說的; tawar慢慢的/輕輕的
#n ku可以替換成ta 我們(包含式)或 ni 你。

gloss: 他.主格=煮飯<受惠焦點>=我.主格
free: #e Saki cooks for me every day.
#n kana wariwari ziya (每天); kana ’ilras ziya (每月); kana ’ami ziya (每年); teru (煮飯/命令式);也可以寫作kana wariwari ziya mu tu deruwanay ku i Saki
#e Saki cooks for my friends every day.
#n i ali’lri 我的朋友 (-lri 我的); i malri 我的爸爸; i nani 我媽媽; i wadilri 我的弟妹; i valri 我的哥哥姊姊，稱呼自己媽媽叫ina
#e After Sanpuy’s aunt finished the laundry yesterday afternoon, she swept the yard.
#c Sanpuy的阿姨昨天下午洗完衣服後，打掃了庭院。

gloss: 主題標示<主事焦點>竹掃把
free: #e Sanpuy’s father’s older sister finished the laundry and swept the yard yesterday afternoon.
#c Sanpuy的姑姑(比爸爸大)昨天下午洗完衣服後，用竹掃把打掃了庭院。
#n maradawan (年齡組織裡面的學長姐 e.g. 中年級的四年級); marama’izang 年齡比較大
#e All of my books are on the table.
#n ulra可用kazu替換; peniya (東西的全部); papiya (人的全部)
#e The teacher likes all of the students.
#e I don’t need the computer Saki has used.
#e I need the computer Saki has used.
#n ay ku (我要); ay (給我); ai (是)
#n hinghing 龍眼; ay ku za (一定要給)
#e Uyang drinks a cup of wine before the time of the festival.
#c Uyang在祭儀開始前會先喝一杯糯米酒。
#n tinavuavu' (釀好的甜酒); kutra (酒); tremekel 喝酒 (喝水不能用) ; palisi祭儀; ka-palisi-yan (祭儀的時間段)
#e Uyang drinks a cup of wine before the time of the festival.
#c Uyang在祭儀開始前會先喝一杯糯米酒。
#e Don’t go with him. He is an alchoholic.
#e All of the teachers will dance tonight.
#c所有老師們今天晚上會跳舞。
#n likasaw (我命令你跳舞); la-likasaw (將要跳舞); ma-likasaw (在跳舞/陳述); ma-likakasaw (正在跳舞/持續動作)
#e Many teachers went dancing last night.
#c多個老師們(非全部)昨天晚上去跳舞。
#n kayta 走吧; kaytayan 很少人; kazuwan na sinsi ma-likasaw a; nu-時間 (還沒到的); a-時間 (已經過的)
#n 死 --> 打: 可理解，但有點怪怪的。應該是先打再死
#e Tanebake already hit and killed Kui.
#c Tanebake 打 (Kui) 然後(打)死了 Kui
#n Semantic anomaly caused by sequential event violation
#e Tanebake will hit and kill Kui
#n madalame-nga 的 'nga' 沒有加重語調時，為 aspectual marker.
#n 當 madalame-nga 的 'nga' 有加重語調時，表示「強調」，非 aspect marker
#n 錯誤句子。'alupu-nga' 的 'nga' 無法確定被分析為 aspect marker 還是強調，因為兩種分析都不合理。若為
#c 這些學生來 (這裡) 學習
#n 「學習 --> 教」違反 sequential action，所以語意理解上怪怪的。但勉強可理解
#e These students had come here to learn.
#c 這些學生來 (這裡) 學習了
#e These students will come to learn.
#c 這些學生會來 (這裡) 學習
#e Kui is very sick for a long time.
#e Kui is very sick for a long time.
#e Tomorrow, Kui will be very sick.
#e Tomorrow, Kui will be very sick.
#e Tomorrow, Kui will be sick seriouly.
#e Tanebake have already hit (and) hurt Kui.
#e Tanebake have already hit (and) hurt Kui.
#e Tomorrow, Tanebake will hit (and) hurt Kui
#e Tomorrow, Tanebake will hit (and) hurt Kui
#e (If sick, ) Kui will hate to eat rice.
#e Kui does not want to eat.
#e (After learning to hunt for some time, ) Kui is able to hunt.
#e Kui is able to hunt (long time ago)
#e Next year, Kui will be able to hunt.
#e Next year, Kui will be better at hunting.
#e These students go to the front (and) get hit by the teacher.
#e These student alreay went to the front (and) get hit by the teacher.
#e These student alreay went to the front (and) get hit by the teacher.
#e These student will go to the front (and) get hit by the teacher.
#e Tanebake have already hit (and) hurt Kui.
#n Strangeness resulting from violation of sequential order.
#e Tomorrow, Kui will be very sick.
#e Tanebake have already hit and hurt Kui.
